word_group.brief_definition: 不全是, 不确切, 并非如此

bilingual.target: 不完全是。我完全吓坏了！

bilingual.source: The script won't be exactly the same as the book.
bilingual.target: 剧本不会和书完全一样。
这两张地图几乎完全一致。

bilingual.source: Your description corresponds exactly to my memory.
bilingual.target: 你的描述与我的记忆完全对应。

bilingual.source: Her story corresponded exactly to what he had told us.
bilingual.target: 她的故事与他告诉我们的内容完全一致。

bilingual.source: His words couldn't be truer; they reflect exactly what I feel.
bilingual.target: 他说的话再真实不过了；它们完全反映了我的感受。

bilingual.source: His prediction hit the bull's-eye and the results were exactly as expected.
bilingual.target: 他的预测正中靶心，结果完全符合预期。

bilingual.source: They are exactly alike except that they have opposite electrical charges.
bilingual.target: 它们完全一样，除了它们的电荷相反。

bilingual.source: As for the future, he has said that he isn't exactly sure what he will choose to do.
bilingual.target: 至于未来，他曾说过，他并不完全确定自己会选择做什么。

list.abstract: exactly是一个英语单词，可以用作副词，可以翻译为精确地、确切地等等。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I think it's exactly what you had planned.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这完全就是你计划好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Exactly. Yeah, you have a good grasp of the physics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 完全正确。看来你很懂物理嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: Put it back exactly where you found it? Yes I'm gonna put it back exactly where I found it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 完全恢复原状吗？当然是完全恢复原状。

yingyinNormal.en: How do you know exactly what she's going through? She told us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么会完全了解她的处境？她告诉我们的嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that is exactly the same thing. You really understand my dilemma.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这两件事还"差不多"啊。你"完全理解"我的困难呢。

yingyinNormal.en: So I was talking to my favorite aunt... Aunt Doe, right? Exactly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我给我最爱的阿姨打电话... 多伊阿姨，对吧？完全正确。

yingyinNormal.en: Sorry. That was very different. Exactly. It was very different. It was honest.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，那情况完全不同。没错，的确不同，那时你是诚恳的。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh! It's not exactly the same as the one you pawned, but... Thank you, dad!
yingyinNormal.zh: 这和你拿去典当的那台不完全相同，可是... 谢谢你，爸爸！

yingyinNormal.en: Feel better, Huckleberry? I'm just like you now. Yeah, we're exactly the same.
yingyinNormal.zh: 感觉好点了吗，哈克贝利？我现在和你们是一伙的。是啊，我们完全一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Over? Maybe not exactly over, but... I should go. This is not what I had planned.
yingyinNormal.zh: 分手了？或许没有完全分手，但是... 我该走了，这可不是我计划好的。

yingyinNormal.en: So you're basically selling grain, except it tastes a lot better.That's exactly right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你从根本上讲还是在卖粮食，只是让它的味道更好一点，完全正确。

yingyinNormal.en: That is not the point. I should have thought that was exactly the point. You've muddled your priorities!
yingyinNormal.zh: 那不是重点。我觉得这才是最重要的。你完全没分清轻重缓急！

yingyinNormal.en: But I will make them quickly, and you need to do exactly as I say. No questions. Can you do that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我会迅速做出决定，你要完全按我说的做，不许有疑问。你能做到吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Exactly. Every man for himself, gentlemen. And those who strike out are stuck with her friends.
yingyinNormal.zh: 完全正确。先生们，每一个都为自己。那些受打击的就和她的朋友在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: Turn here. Listen carefully. If you do exactly as I say, I can get you out of here. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这边转弯，好好听着，如果你完全按照我说的做，我可以帮你离开这里。你说啥？

yingyinNormal.en: Hi. Hey, anyone hear from Phoebe yet? No, nothing. I hope she's OK. Yeah, I know exactly what she's going through.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有没有菲比的消息？没有。希望她没事。是呀，我完全了解她的处境。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, which way is home? Are we lost, Daddy Pig? Don't worry. I know exactly where we are. This way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，哪条路是回家的？我们迷路了吗，猪爸爸？别担心。我完全清楚我们在哪儿。这边走。

yingyinNormal.en: We do not know exactly what this signifies but the result appears to be a total collapse of the enemy's capacity to fight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们虽然还没有查明原因到底是什么，但是结果却表明我们的敌人已经完全丧失了战斗能力。

yingyinNormal.en: What am I looking at? Exactly. I cannot remember the name of this thing. It was like a kimchi, okra, mussels stew?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么？完全没错。我也不记得这菜叫什么了... 有点像掺了朝鲜泡菜，黄秋葵和贻贝的炖菜？

yingyinNormal.en: Paul, Kip and myself, we discussed, "Okay, we'll visualize the thing. We'll simulate the thing exactly as the calculations say."
yingyinNormal.zh: 我和保罗、基普，我们讨论，“好，我们会将这东西形象化，我们会完全按计算结果模拟这东西。”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 精确地；准确地；确切地；确切地说；明确地；正是如此；一点不错

word_family.mean: adj. 确切的；准确的；精确的；严谨的；严密的

sense_info_list.en: used when you are giving or asking for information that is completely correct

examination_example.sentence: That is <highlight>exactly</highlight> what happened when Norway adopted a nationwide corporate gender quota.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当挪威在全国范围内实行企业性别配额时，情况正是如此。

examination_example.sentence: This year marks <highlight>exactly</highlight> two centuries since the publication of "Frankenstein; or, The Modern Prometheus," by Mary Shelley.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年正好是玛丽·雪莱所著《弗兰肯斯坦》或《现代普罗米修斯》出版以来的两个世纪。

examination_example.sentence: Conceived in this way, comprehension will not follow <highlight>exactly</highlight> the same track for each reader.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以这种方式构思，每个读者的理解不会遵循完全相同的轨迹。

sense_info_list.en: used to ask for more information about something

examination_example.sentence: And if you do, what <highlight>exactly</highlight> should you say?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你知道，你应该说什么？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Exactly</highlight> when that day will be is a matter of debate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一天究竟会在什么时候到来还有待商榷。

examination_example.sentence: We will have to wait and see <highlight>exactly</highlight> how these hard times will reshape our social fabric.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们要拭目以待，看看这些艰难时期将如何重塑我们的社会结构。

sense_info_list.en: used as a reply, agreeing with what someone has just said

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

adj. 不精确的；不准确的

word_family.mean: adj. 确切的；准确的；精确的；严谨的；严密的

sense_info_list.en: used when you are giving or asking for information that is completely correct

examination_example.sentence: Not <highlight>exactly</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不完全如此。

examination_example.sentence: The question is whether those kinds of experiences do so systematically across individuals and create <highlight>exactly</highlight> the same changes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 问题在于，这些经历是否会系统性地影响个体，并产生完全相同的变化。

examination_example.sentence: It reduces our curiosity by showing us <highlight>exactly</highlight> what we already want and think, based on our profiles and preferences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基于我们的个人资料和偏好，它通过向我们展示我们已经想要和想的东西来减少我们的好奇心。

sense_info_list.en: used to ask for more information about something

examination_example.sentence: Schellenberg didn't tell his assistants what <highlight>exactly</highlight> he was trying to prove.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Schellenberg没有告诉他的助手他到底想努力证明什么。

examination_example.sentence: If consumers say they want transparency, tell them <highlight>exactly</highlight> what is in your product.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果消费者说他们想要透明，告诉他们你的产品到底是什么。

sense_info_list.en: used as a reply, agreeing with what someone has just said

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 精确地；准确地；确切地；确切地说；明确地；正是如此；一点不错

word_family.mean: adj. 确切的；准确的；精确的；严谨的；严密的

sense_info_list.en: used to ask for more information about something

examination_example.sentence: But researchers aren't sure <highlight>exactly</highlight> why poor kids in San Jose did so well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但研究人员并不确定究竟为什么圣何塞的穷孩子表现这么好。

examination_example.sentence: Well, what <highlight>exactly</highlight> can your firm do for my company?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，贵公司究竟能为我们公司做些什么呢？

examination_example.sentence: The most difficult step in programming values will be deciding <highlight>exactly</highlight> what we believe is moral.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对价值观进行编程最困难的一步将是精准地认定我们的道德观。

sense_info_list.en: used when you are giving or asking for information that is completely correct

examination_example.sentence: And that's not <highlight>exactly</highlight> an unexpected question.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这并不是一个出乎意料的问题。

examination_example.sentence: "Looking at studies that tested concentration, the number of studies showing a benefit was <highlight>exactly</highlight> the same as the number that found no benefit," she says. "And no studies found that eating breakfast was bad for concentration."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她说：“看看那些测试注意力的研究，结论是有益的研究的数量和发现无益的研究的数量是完全相同的。但没有研究发现，吃早餐不利于注意力的集中。”

examination_example.sentence: PepsiCo did not say <highlight>exactly</highlight> how much it planned to invest to reach its goals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 百事可乐公司没有确切透露计划投资多少以实现其目标。

sense_info_list.en: used as a reply; agreeing with what someone has just said

examination_example.sentence: Reaching our goals will need <highlight>exactly</highlight> this kind of partnership approach.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实现我们的目标恰恰需要这种伙伴关系。

examination_example.sentence: The food is <highlight>exactly</highlight> the same as the stuff you buy in a conventional shop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 食物和你在传统商店里买的一模一样。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 精确地；准确地；确切地；确切地说；明确地；正是如此；一点不错

word_family.mean: adj. 确切的；准确的；精确的；严谨的；严密的

sense_info_list.en: used as a reply, agreeing with what someone has just said

examination_example.sentence: That's <highlight>exactly</highlight> what I did.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我就是这么做的。

examination_example.sentence: The international scholars' warning letter doesn't say <highlight>exactly</highlight> what collapse will look like or when it might happen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国际学者的警告信并没有确切说明崩盘会是什么样子或何时发生。

examination_example.sentence: I'm not <highlight>exactly</highlight> sure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不是很确定。

examination_example.sentence: My brother and I are <highlight>exactly</highlight> one year apart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我弟弟和我刚好相差一岁。

examination_example.sentence: Jenna and Jeff knew <highlight>exactly</highlight> what to do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 珍娜和杰夫确切知道该怎么办。

sense_info_list.en: used to ask for more information about something

examination_example.sentence: What <highlight>exactly</highlight> will you be doing?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你到底要做什么？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 精确地；准确地；确切地；确切地说；明确地；正是如此；一点不错

word_family.mean: adj. 确切的；准确的；精确的；严谨的；严密的

sense_info_list.en: used when you are giving or asking for information that is completely correct

examination_example.sentence: It was <highlight>exactly</highlight> what I needed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这正是我所需要的。

examination_example.sentence: The robot can judge the skill levels of human players <highlight>exactly</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机器人可以准确判断人类玩家的技能水平。

examination_example.sentence: The bus can go to different directions <highlight>exactly</highlight> with the help of GPS.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在全球定位系统的帮助下，公共汽车可以准确地去往不同的方向。

sense_info_list.en: used to ask for more information about something

examination_example.sentence: No one knew <highlight>exactly</highlight> where they came from.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有人知道他们究竟来自哪里。

examination_example.sentence: But what <highlight>exactly</highlight> is a robot?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是机器人到底是什么呢？

examination_example.sentence: And what did they do, <highlight>exactly</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们到底做了什么？

sense_info_list.en: used as a reply, agreeing with what someone has just said

examination_example.sentence: Not <highlight>exactly</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不完全是。

examination_example.sentence: Yes, <highlight>exactly</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是的，没错。
